template.template_analysis: The faangpath_simple template is structured for a clean and professional look suitable for technical roles. It provides a clear layout for showcasing skills and experiences effectively.
template.customization_options: Key customization options include adjusting color schemes, fonts, and section headings to align with the candidate's personal style and preferences.

detected_fields.ai_field_analysis: Utilize the 'name' and 'address' commands to display the candidate's personal information prominently. Consider customizing the 'tab' and 'itab' commands for better alignment and spacing.

candidate_data.name: Maciej Kasik
candidate_data.profile_summary: Motivated Computer Science graduate with a strong foundation in programming and problem-solving, looking to leverage skills in Cloud Data Engineering, SQL, AWS, and data pipeline design. Excited about opportunities to optimize system performance, ensure data integrity, and contribute to scalable data solutions.

Education requirements.field: Computer Science, Information Systems, or related field

Key responsibilities: Designing, developing, and maintaining secure and scalable data pipelines
Migrating SQL Server to Snowflake on AWS Cloud
Implementing medallion architecture for data structuring
Company values/culture mentions: Building a better world through financial inclusion
Certifications or qualifications: Certifications in Snowflake, AWS, or other cloud platforms
Exact phrases for CV: Hands-on experience with Snowflake, SQL, AWS, ETL, and data pipeline design
Proven success in migrating SQL Server to the cloud, ensuring data integrity and performance
Skilled in bronze, silver, and gold layers, ensuring data reliability, scalability, and accessibility
Experience in query optimization, data modeling, and system performance tuning
Knowledge of encryption, access control, and regulatory compliance for cloud-based systems
Ability to translate technical concepts into business insights, working effectively with architects, analysts, and leadership
Anticipates challenges, removes obstacles, and creates scalable long-term solutions

profile_enhancement.improvement_suggestions: Consider gaining experience or certifications in AI and ETL to better align with the job requirements. Highlight your existing skills in SQL, AWS, Data Engineering, Cloud, Security, and Performance tuning in more detail.

job_analysis.template_specific_recommendations: Utilize the 'Skills' section of the template to emphasize your proficiency in SQL, AWS, Data Engineering, Cloud, Security, and Performance tuning. Consider adding a 'Certifications' section to showcase any relevant certifications in Snowflake, AWS, or other cloud platforms.
